item.title: Let's Defend - Wanna Story
item.description: Description MMOX Lab GOT infected with a ransomware, as one of our new emplyees with not aware enough of the phising campains. Can you track what happend to answer the following Questions. Athor : [MMOX](https://www.linkedin.com/in/0xMM0X) required Tools: Volatilty 2 or 3 OST Viewier OLEDUMP with PLUGIN_BIFF Writeup Q1 1: What is the md5 hash of the desk and memory images? this just a santy check to make sure that you have the right images
